meanings.definition: The top or summit of a cliff.
meanings.sent1: From the clifftop, we could see the vast ocean below.
meanings.sent2: The hikers sat at the clifftop, enjoying the breathtaking view.
meanings.sent3: The adventurous squirrel climbed to the clifftop for a better view of the park.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high like a bird perched on a clifftop.
meanings.sent5: The clifftop was a peaceful sanctuary above the noisy city.

meanings.definition: Located at the top of a cliff.
meanings.sent1: The clifftop restaurant offered stunning views of the sunset.
meanings.sent2: The clifftop house was perched precariously on the edge.
meanings.sent3: The clifftop wedding venue made the ceremony truly unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: Her clifftop garden felt like a secret paradise above the world.
meanings.sent5: The clifftop village seemed to touch the sky on clear days.
